## AABB.containsBox() method

Check if the AABB contains all of the eight corner point of another AABB

**Signature:**

```typescript
containsBox(other: AABB): boolean;
```

[AABB](doc/markdown/./base.aabb.md)


</td><td>

The AABB to be checked.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

true if all contains, otherwise false.
